summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1285, for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue North, from Roanoke Street to Shelby Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein water mains of proper dimensions, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13977 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
